==Supported features in public alpha release==
  * [http://www.modaco.com/content-page/298997/closed-android-on-omnia-2/page/700/#entry1255545 Get it here]
  * Android 2.1 (Eclair)
  * Display and touchscreen
  * Hardware keys
  * Internal storage
  * I920: landscape only modus (boot with uncompressed image)

==Supported features in latest public beta release==
  * [http://o2droid.phj.hu/index_en.php Get it here]
  * *Hardware*
    * Display & Touch screen
    * Hardware keys
    * Internal & External storage
    * Vibrator
    * FM radio
    * Sound & Audio output via 3.5mm jack
    * Orientation (Accelometer), Magnetic (Compass), Light and Temperature sensors

  * *Connectivity* 
    * Phone & messaging
    * Wifi
    * GSM data (GPRS/2G/3G/..)
    * USB (ADB)
    * GPS

  * *Software*
    * Android 2.1 (Eclair)
    * Android market  
    * Superuser access (rooted) 
    * 2D/3D acceleration (libs are not included due to legal issues)
    * Open-source patches: [http://o2droid.phj.hu/trac/browser I8000] [http://code.google.com/p/omnia2droid/issues/detail?id=6 B7610] [http://howto.homelinux.com/trac/log/ M715&M8400]  

  * *Other Features*
    * Battery driver/charging
    * Brightness control/backlight

  * *Compatibility on Omnia II (I8000) like phones*
    * Omnia pro (B7610): wifi not working [http://code.google.com/p/omnia2droid/issues/detail?id=12 issue]
    * Omnia pro (B7610): sensors working but inverted [http://code.google.com/p/omnia2droid/issues/detail?id=29 issue]
    * Omnia pro (B7610): hardware keyboard not working [http://code.google.com/p/omnia2droid/issues/detail?id=6 fixed]
    * Omnia pro (B7610): some hardware buttons not working [http://code.google.com/p/omnia2droid/issues/detail?id=6 fixed]
    * Omnia pro (B7610): vibration not working  [http://code.google.com/p/omnia2droid/issues/detail?id=6 fixed]
    * T*Omnia II (M715): not working when not connected to USB [ftp://howto.homelinux.com/o2droid/images fixed]
    * T*Omnia II (M715): headphone plug problem [ftp://howto.homelinux.com/o2droid/images fixed]
    * T*Omnia II (M715): some hardware buttons not working  [ftp://howto.homelinux.com/o2droid/images fixed]
    * T*Omnia II (M715): phone not working (>rev??)  
    * Show Omnia (M8400): wifi not working [ftp://howto.homelinux.com/o2droid/images fixed]
    * Show Omnia (M8400): USB/headphone plug/hardware buttons problems [ftp://howto.homelinux.com/o2droid/images fixed]
    * Verizon Omnia II (I920): not working
 
==Features under active development==
  * Camera's
  * Proximity sensor (only kernel support yet)
  * Bluetooth (only kernel support yet)
  * I920: Beta support 

==Features under development==
  * Android 2.2 (Froyo) {some Beta/Eclair features broken)
  * Android 2.3 (Gingerbread) {slooooow and some Beta/Eclair features broken}
 
==Possible future features==
  * Android kernel and image build from github.com
  * TV-Out 
  * B7610: wifi driver
  * I920: CDMA phone part
